name: The Cirqle
slogan: The only Influencer Marketing Platfrom that can tie Engagement to Sales
description: The Cirqle is a cloud-based software platform allowing agencies and brands to manage, monitor and measure real-time, scaleable cross-border influencer campaigns. Our platform provides clients with key insights on their talent’s social performance, whilst allowing OAuth verified Influencers and agencies to easily create beautiful influencer campaigns with trackability to off-and-online sales.

team.title: Founder & CEO
team.name: Steven Lammertink
team.bioHtml: Founder of The Cirqle • Self taught designer • Visiting scholar at @Adobe Systems • Kauffman Global Scholar • Digital at Salle Privee

team.title: Chief Product Officer
team.name: Jelle Van de Velde
team.bioHtml: Doctorate in Human-Computer Interaction. Taking product design from inception & design to production ready code. Thrive in a fast-paced environment.

team.name: Anju Madan
team.bioHtml: Head of EU and Asian Partnerships at Thecirqle.com

jobs.title: Frontend engineer
jobs.description:
Our customer-facing web applications are build using Vue.js and talk to an Node.js backend layer. We have implemented a product that is already used by a great number of users, but our plans expand way beyond that. Our ideal frontend engineer will be expected to develop these applications further, with a good deal of freedom in his or her choices of technology and architecture. 

What you will do
Create functional, intuitive and responsive, cross-browser experiences
Design, build and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable JavaScript code
Be involved with new features and products, start to finish

Qualifications
2+ years of experience in a relevant role, preferably in a commercial environment
Excellent knowledge of HTML/(S)CSS, Javascript (ES6), and at least one SPA framework, preferably Vue.js
You know how to structure your (S)CSS with BEM or another methodology
Experience with responsive website design and development
Experience implementing (Node.js) API's in the front end
Experience with templating languages
Ability to write high-performance, reusable code
A good understanding of cross-browser compatibility issues and experience troubleshooting them
Knowledge of version control systems
Keen eye for good visual design

Bonus points
Experience with testing frameworks
Experience with data-driven product development: analytics, A/B testing, etcYou will be part of full product development life cycle – requirements, development and maintenance

jobs.title: Senior UX Designer
jobs.description:
The Cirqle is looking for a highly talented UX designer to elevate the digital experience for all our customers. You’ll lead prototyping and designing effort and develop visually compelling user experiences that deal with complex data.

Our ideal lead UX Designer guarantees that it is a joy for influencers, brands and agencies to interact and engage with our product. Our platform enables i) influencers to track growth and join campaigns ii) brands to harness data-driven decisions to work with influencers and iii) agencies to help scale campaigns across multiple countries and account managers .

You’ll be able to design visually brilliant and inspiring products that embody a clean and polished UI that in all its elegance, becomes the industry standard. Understanding that there is a fine balance between creativity and data/insights is key; but presenting this to our clients in a clear-cut way is even more important.

Not only do you have a great sense of design, you also have an intuitive sense for how to elevate digital experiences that people love. One of your main responsibilities will be to design for conversion and figure out what works in the future of digital commerce and how the crossroads of on- and offline work together. User-centered design comes natural to you.

The position is fulltime and directly available.

About the role:
You will be involved in the entire online development as lead designer in our tech team, from conceptualising new ideas to testing your designs with real customers and elevating existing designs. Our digital team is multidisciplinary with developers, data-scientists, marketers and analysts. At The Cirqle we fundamentally lead the industry by rapidly developing products in a fast pace and with tremendous impact. You feel comfortable in this type of environment. You get things done in an iterative design process of days or weeks instead of months.

You'll be…
Elevate our current product suite driven by creativity, data and user insights
Improving stickiness of our product by running tests via a continuous improvement cycle
Managing structured usability research to get client insights
Translating research into prototypes and implementing them in our design system
Monitoring the customer conversion paths across the website

About you:
You love design and know how to express your passion
You have a positive attitude, an open mind and a desire to collaborate
You are on the strategic side of digital design, but understand what visually works
You have designed online products and apps for mobile, tablet and laptop in the past
You get excited about finding out what the intersection of online ad campaigns and offline ROI means
You don't think of design in isolation; it's part of an entire customer experience.
You care about our clients and take pride in your work
You are able to function independently and set direction
Essential skills and experience:
Strong and proven track record working in digital design (at least 4+ years of experience)
Experienced in designing customer journeys, flowcharts, wireframes and information architectures (service design thinking)
Excellent communication skills (English) to clearly articulate your concepts and design decisions
Understanding of usability research is required, experience in analytics and user interview is a plus
Mastery of relevant tools; Sketch, InVision, Omnigraffle, etc

We offer you
The chance to be part of a young, driven and ambitious team
Experience how it is to work in a vibrant international scale-up company
A lot of learning on the job and personal development
A broad scope of responsibilities
Free lunch and cool trips
Vondelgym right down the stairs

jobs.title: Business Developer (brands)
jobs.description: Help grow the platform and bring on board more brands interested in the service.
jobs.descriptionHtml: Help grow the platform and bring on board more brands interested in the service.

jobs.title: Accounts Manager
jobs.description:
About us:

The Cirqle is a hybrid technology company and Influencer Marketing Agency. We have a handpicked network of 40,000+ creators worldwide and we connect brands with the right influencers for marketing campaigns at scale. Our data-driven predictive platform empowers thousands of influencers — from bloggers and local creatives to celebrities shaping the world’s biggest and boldest social presence — to share their stories and create an impactful, stylish, and easy-to-manage campaign for renowned clients worldwide.


What we'd like you to do: 

+ Be responsible for several (key) accounts at the same time
+ Be responsible for the execution, management and quality control of multiple campaigns;
+ Mentor trainees and junior team members
+ Contribute to the idea generation process & development of new campaign concepts;
+ Ensure optimal communication throughout the project team at all stages of the campaign;
+ Contribute to ongoing improvements of internal processes and efficiency across the teams and project team members;
+ Contribute to producing campaign assets and take the lead in on-set productions.


Culture:

To us diversity contributes to innovation and opportunities. We have a very well balanced team in terms of gender and although our 2 leaders and founders are Dutch, the team is very international and we want to keep it this way. However, to us diversity is not just about gender and nationality. It means having a team made up of people coming from various walks of life imaginable.

The relationships in our team are based on mutual trust and openness. The office-vibe is friendly and our 2 un-common founders sing while walking through our cosy office. We are a very open-minded group of people BUT we don’t just welcome new ideas, we expect you to present them to us continuously in a very proactive way. 

On the other hand, we have our culture targets. We are pointing our culture and transform it into one where people have super clear domains and responsibilities. We value feedback, but at the same time, we don’t believe in debating about things endlessly and want to transform our people-operational system into one where everyone have clear domains and responsibilities to enable speed and be ahead of the game

jobs.title: Internship Vacancy - Influencer Team
jobs.description:
You will be part of the Influencer Team, consisting out 3 full-timers and you’ll be working across the Sales Team, Campaign Management and of course the Influencer Team.

Support the Campaign & Sales Teams by sourcing and identifying key influencers, bloggers, and talent across various social platforms.
Maintaining internal and external databases of influencers to ensure quality and up to date information, and identifying new ways to improve the cross-team workflow.

Communicate with Influencers about new campaigns, announcements of new features, blogs, and supporting the Influencer Resource Center.


Who are we looking for?

+ Someone who’s excited about online content and who is aware of all the latest social media trends.
+ A student HBO or WO with an interest in Influencer Marketing, we are open to any field of study. 
+ We are looking for someone who speaks and writes English and at least one other language (preferred).
+ Knowledge of Keynote & Google Docs
+ Bonus for experience in
+ Influencer Marketing
+ Photoshop
+ Sketch
+ Squarespace
+ AirTable
+ CreateSend (by CampaignMonitor)
+ Intercom

Perks
+ Work in a young, dynamic, and international team
+ Work with international brands and well-known influencers
+ Lunches provided daily
+ Dedicated desk and external monitor screen
+ Friday G&Ts

jobs.title: Internship/trainee - Campaign management & Business Development
jobs.description:
You will play a supporting role in developing our presence in the APAC region. You will work directly with the Managing Director for Asia and you will collaborate with the executive team in Amsterdam and New York on a frequent basis. Your activities will be varied such as creating proposals, managing influencers, supporting regional campaigns, doing market research within China, Korea and South East Asia, reaching out to potential clients, planning travel itineraries, setting up and managing our local online presence etc.

Are you positive minded and passionate about playing a crucial role in building a business in Asia. Are you excited to work within a vibrant and energetic team amongst multiple locations? Are you resourceful and are you disciplined enough to manage your own tasks well and on time? Then we want to meet with you!

Are you resourceful and are you disciplined enough to manage your own tasks well and on time? Then we want to meet with you!

jobs.title: Leader - Head of Customer Succes
jobs.description:
About us:
The Cirqle is a cloud-based software platform allowing agencies and brands to manage, monitor and measure real-time, scaleable cross-border influencer campaigns. Our platform provides clients with key insights on their talent’s social performance, whilst allowing OAuth verified Influencers and agencies to easily create beautiful influencer campaigns with trackability to off-and-online sales. Via the Cirqle platform clients can Activate, Amplify and Attribute the campaign content: The Cirqle is the only platform that can tie engagement to sales.

The Cirqle maintains a diverse client base, mostly in the United States. Industry sectors include Hospitality, Cities, Restaurants, fashion, beauty and health (products). 

Some of our clients include:
Subway, McDonald's, Samsung, Manchester City, Scotch & Soda, Swarovski, Barnes & Noble, NYC’s Garment District, Heineken & many more!

Our culture:
At The Cirqle, as a team, we move fast and are full of initiative. We are organized, efficient, analytical thinkers and have the ability to multitask across various brands with a strong passion for social.

About the role:
As a leader of the Customer Success Team, you will independently grow the team, manage and deepen the (team’s) relationships with key existing and new clients and lead by example to junior employees within the team. 
You will drive and deliver our short and long term vision and strategy, with the aim of improving innovation and efficiency throughout. At the same time, you’ll be making sure our processes can scale up effortlessly, as we add more customers and happy users on-board. Next to that, you will maintain full overview across all campaigns using The Cirqles’ platform and also manage key clients and campaigns. 
You will work closely with the sales and product teams to retain our clients and guard The Cirqles’ positioning as a premium, market-leading, tech-driven solution to influencer/social media marketing. This role comes with a high level of autonomy and leadership opportunity.

Experience requirements:
Analytical mindset and experience, understanding reporting, digital performance metrics and capable of identifying marketing trends from data (The Cirqle platform and other tools).
Team manager and a Team player. Be a pillar for the team and guide the team and their personal development.
Experience in or understanding of social media strategies working with platforms including Facebook Business Manager, Instagram Ads, Snap Ads, Twitter Ads, LinkedIn Campaign Manager. Knowledge of newer social platforms such as Tik Tok is a bonus.
Capable of understanding client needs and opportunities to extend our services: making sure campaign plans are in line with their target audiences and marketing objectives.
Displaying a proactive approach to everything; we want you to contribute and show as much initiative as possible - ideas are always welcome, actions are even more so.
Structuring programs and running timelines for campaigns, liaising with the team and clients directly, keeping everything on track and everyone informed.
Strong commercial acumen with a willingness to sell-in commercial opportunities that are right for the client’s needs.
Strong presentation skills. Ability to format presentations and structure emails clearly.
Producing case studies - Analysing the client’s success and being able to formulate a case study.
Ability to remain organized in a fast-paced environment; remain calm whilst working under pressure.
Fluent in/native English
Passionate about media especially the brand and performance dynamic, coupled with a strong business, market, consumer and brand/performance understanding.

Bonus for experience in
Tech-driven companies
Data analysis
Leadership
Customer Experience
Project Management
Operational Excellence
Influencer Marketing
Paas platforms

Perks
Salary in line with your experience
Work in a young, dynamic, and growing international team
Work with international clients and well-known influencers
Lunches provided daily
Dedicated desk and external monitor screen
Friday drinks & quarterly team get-togethers
20+ fun colleagues around the globe

Is this you? Contact us @ daan@thecirqle.com

jobs.title: Traineeship - Influencer Marketing Knowledge Ninja
jobs.description:
About us:

The Cirqle is a hybrid technology company and Influencer Marketing Agency. We have a handpicked network of 40,000+ creators worldwide and we connect brands with the right influencers for marketing campaigns at scale. Our data-driven predictive platform empowers thousands of influencers — from bloggers and local creatives to celebrities shaping the world’s biggest and boldest social presence — to share their stories and create an impactful, stylish, and easy-to-manage campaign for renowned clients worldwide.

What we'd like you to do:

+ You will play a supporting role in developing our Training & Development initiatives. 
+ You will work directly with the Director for Training & Development and you will collaborate with the team in Amsterdam on a frequent basis. 
+ Your activities will be varied such as creating content, managing events, supporting our efforts by coming up with new ideas on how to emerge as an industry knowledge leader and subsequently manage these projects. 
+ You will be involved in doing market research within Europe, US and Asia and managing our online presence etc.

Are you positive minded and passionate about playing a crucial role in building expert knowledge hubs in Influencer marketing and tech? Are you excited to work within a vibrant and energetic team amongst multiple locations? Are you resourceful and are you disciplined enough to manage your own tasks well and on time? Then we want to meet with you!

Culture:

To us diversity contributes to innovation and opportunities. We have a very well balanced team in terms of gender and although our 2 leaders and founders are Dutch, the team is very international and we want to keep it this way. However, to us diversity is not just about gender and nationality. It means having a team made up of people coming from various walks of life imaginable.

The relationships in our team are based on mutual trust and openness. The office-vibe is friendly and our 2 un-common founders sing while walking through our cosy office. We are a very open-minded group of people BUT we don’t just welcome new ideas, we expect you to present them to us continuously in a very proactive way.

On the other hand, we have our culture targets. We are pointing our culture and transform it into one where people have super clear domains and responsibilities. We value feedback, but at the same time, we don’t believe in debating about things endlessly and want to transform our people-operational system into one where everyone have clear domains and responsibilities to enable speed and be ahead of the game
